description:
After Ariane’s intense onslaught, Amelia is prepared to lose. But right then, Ray reaches the arena and cheers her on. With her morale boosted, she begins to nullify Ariane’s attacks with a new spell and finally begins to strike back. She puts on the pressure on her opponent, but her body is also reaching its limits. Finally, the two girls exhaust themselves and the battle comes to a close. On the other hand, in the final fight of the main bracket, Rebecca faces the tournament’s dark horse, Lucas Forst…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plus puissant sorcier du monde brise des entraves
Sekai Saikyou no Majutsushi de Aru Shounen wa, Jubaku o Kaihou Suru
The Boy Who Became the World`s Strongest Sorcerer Releases the Binds
世界最強の魔術師である少年は, 呪縛を解放する
